about.summary: SyGMa is a python library for the systematic generation of potential metabolites.

name: sygma
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "sygma" %}
{% set version = "1.1.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/3D-e-Chem/{{ name}}/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 37bb8ad2ddcb14c788191727cf54c136550ce2b7ec98f0db181ab8bba618263b

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"
  entry_points:
    - sygma=sygma.script:main

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python
    - rdkit
  run:
    - python
    - rdkit
    - setuptools

test:
  imports:
    - sygma

about:
  home: https://github.com/3D-e-Chem/sygma
  license: GPL-3.0
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'SyGMa is a python library for the systematic generation of potential metabolites.'
  doc_url: https://sygma.readthedocs.io
  dev_url: https://github.com/3D-e-Chem/sygma

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - simonbray
